descriptionHtml:
Meet Belus the Frostbite. Belus is an expert poisoner, like his father and like his father\'s father. He resides in the Winking Skeever, in Solitude. He is wearing a Black Thief Armour set. He sells various deadly poisons to kill and to paralyze your target.

REQUIREMENTS:
Probably the Last Update.

SPECIAL THANKS TO:
Creation Kit.

PERMISSONS:
You can use the file in your own mod only by my personal permission. Thank you.
author: Birusk
